title: TreeLion Natural Food Juice Bar
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, International, Organic, Juice bar, Take-out, Ital, Jamaican, RasTafarI
description: Vegetarian restaurant. Menu includes items like porridge with banana, plantain, cornmeal, Irish moss, oats, pumpkin seed; fried and boiled dumpling; fried plantain; callaloo & ackee when in season; brown rice & peas, boiled yam; rasta pasta, baked tofu; okra veggie fish; and soup of the day. Beverages include juices, fresh coconut water. Look for Jamaican flag on north side of Hallendale Beach Blvd.
